articles.title: 'Pleased to inform' promoter died, says firm in BSE filing. Twitter on a roll - Hindustan Times
articles.description: AK Spintex, a textile manufacturer firm, made a mistake in its application to the Bombay Stock Exchange on Thursday. | Latest News India
articles.content:
A Rajasthan-based firm recently disgraced itself by declaring in a corporate filing that it was "pleased" to announce the death of its promoter.
